title: Confirmed: PlayStation 5 and PS5 Pro have VRR stuttering problems
description: We've received a continuous stream of reports over the last few months suggesting there's a problem with PlayStation 5: VRR support has an issue where game performance can be interrupted by a continuous, obvious stutter that manifests every eight seconds. Various theories have been shared and discussed online, covering a range of displays and firmwares but after spending some time investigating the problem, we can confirm it is a real problem, impacting both PS5 and Pro consoles - and based on our tests, it will impact any VRR-compatible display. Read more

title: Sorry, other game devs, but Rockstar is still keeping quiet about a release date in the name of maintaining "anticipation"
description: There's a lot we still don't know about GTA 6, but probably the most annoying thing that has gone unanswered is just when it's coming out. Not annoying in the sense of, "oh golly gosh I'm so excited please I need to know", more "come on now, just get it over with!" It's just a whole thing, and I wish it wasn't, but Rockstar and their owner Take-Two also clearly know it's a whole thing, and are riding on that very fact. Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick recently spoke with Bloomberg about a whole bunch of bits, and of course the question of when GTA 6 is coming out came up. Read more
author: Oisin Kuhnke

title: Treeplanter is a woodland simulation game where every sale helps plant actual trees
description: We can probably all agree that planting trees is pretty much universally good, right? I can't really imagine a scenario where planting a tree is a bad thing, we need them to live after all. If you're not into planting trees you're probably an oil tycoon, or a squirrel with incredibly bad survival instincts. If you are, though, might I interest you in Treeplanter, a game whose name is exactly what it says on the tin? It was announced just yesterday, and looks quite, quite lovely. Read more
author: Oisin Kuhnke

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 872
description: Soâ€¦what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isnâ€™t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. Itâ€™s just a list of more or less random questions Iâ€™ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Which is the hardest to do: engage in small talk with strangers, ask for directions, paint your toe nails or cook a meal without a recipe? For the life of me, I canâ€™t make most meals without having a recipe to follow. Iâ€™m not one of those people who can cook from the heart and throw ingredients together with abandon. I need precise measurements (because one personâ€™s pinch of salt might mean something completely different to someone else) and guidelines, otherwise Iâ€™ll short circuit. 2. Do you wanna go dancing at the pink pony club? Sure, why not? Iâ€™m gonna keep on daaaaaan-cingâ€¦ 3. What language would you like to be fluent in: French, Cantonese, Arabic or sign language? All of them. LOL! title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 855
description: Yup, the boss lady wants us to tighten our belts around here. It looks like the economy is slowing down a bit, so no more Tuesday all-you-can-eat turkey or free five-egg omelets in the cafeteria. She wants everyone in the company to cut back, and that includes Rosie and Marnie. Starting immediately, there will be no more kibble showers! The leadership committee is hard at work identifying opportunities for process improvementâ€¦ Rosie and CHO (Chief Hugging Officer) Whiskers are upping the napping quota by a staggering 15%! That means more hugs for everyone! Or else!!! Itâ€™s gonna be rough for a while. Hopefully things turn around soon. I have faith in Rosieâ€™s leadership ability. And where many leaders lack empathy, she really goes out of her way to show she cares about people. Itâ€™s very motivating! Marnie is totally fired up about it. I sure wish Tabs were still around because he was so good at business. He would have known how to navigate a downturn better than anyone. ðŸ˜Š Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,[Continue reading...] The post Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 855 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
